title: Andrew Tran - IMDb
meta_description: Andrew Tran. Visual Effects: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2. Andrew Tran was born on 6 February 1988 in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. Andrew is a cinematographer, known for The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2 (2015), Assassin's Creed (2016) and Avengers: Infinity War (2018).
